Hello Xavier,

It appears that the issue you were experiencing was related to a caching problem. To resolve this, we have regenerated the CSS data and cleared the site's cache on our end, which has successfully resolved the issue from our perspective.

Could you please verify if the solution is effective on your side as well?

@ricaR All good on thsi one. I have regenerated the css files and cleared the site cache.
+15mins Thanks!

https://ramequipment.com.au/
